subclassfeature3.name: Frenzy
subclassfeature3.description: While Raging and using Reckless Attack, deal a number of d6 extra damage to the first target hit on my turn.

subclassfeature6.name: Mindless Rage
subclassfeature6.description: While Raging, I am immune to Charmed and Frightened conditions. These conditions end when I enter Rage.

subclassfeature10.name: Retaliation
subclassfeature10.description: As a Reaction, make a melee attack against a creature within 5 feet when it damages me.

subclassfeature14.name: Intimidating Presence
subclassfeature14.description: As a Bonus Action, cause creatures in a 30-foot radius to make a Wisdom save (DC 8 + Strength mod + Proficiency). On failure, they are Frightened for 1 minute, repeating the save at each turn's end. Regain use after a Long Rest or by expending a Rage use.

subclassfeature3.name: Bonus Proficiencies
subclassfeature3.description: I gain proficiency with three skills of my choice

subclassfeature3.1.name: Cutting Words
subclassfeature3.1.description:
As a reaction, when a foe within earshot & 60 ft rolls ability check, attack or damage,
   I can subtract a Bardic Inspiration die from the result unless the foe can't be charmed

subclassfeature6.name: Additional Magical Secrets
subclassfeature6.description: I can add two spells/cantrips from any class to my Spells Known

subclassfeature14.name: Peerless Skill
subclassfeature14.description: When making an ability check, I can expend a use of Bardic Inspiration to add the die

subclassfeature1.name: Bonus Proficiency
subclassfeature1.description: I gain proficiency with heavy armor

subclassfeature1.1.name: Disciple of Life
subclassfeature1.1.description:
Whenever a 1st-level or higher spell I cast restores HP to a creature, it heals more
   The creature regains an additional 2 + spell level (SL) worth of hit points
   Note that "X/SL" on the spell page means per spell slot level above the spell's normal level

spellAdd: When I use a spell that restores hit points, it restores an additional 2 + the level of the spell slot (or spell slot equivalent) used to cast the spell.

subclassfeature2.name: Channel Divinity: Preserve Life
subclassfeature2.description:
As an action, I can heal any creature within 30 ft of me up to half their maximum HP
   I divide the number of hit points among the creatures as I see fit

subclassfeature6.name: Blessed Healer
subclassfeature6.description: When I restore HP to another with a spell, I regain 2 + the spell (slot) level in HP

spellAdd: When I cast a spell that restores hit points to another creature than myself at the moment of casting, I also heal 2 + the level of the spell slot (or spell slot equivalent) hit points.

subclassfeature8.name: Divine Strike
subclassfeature8.description: Once per turn, when I hit a creature with a weapon attack, I can do extra damage

atkAdd: Once per turn, I can have one of my weapon attacks that hit do extra radiant damage.

subclassfeature17.name: Supreme Healing
subclassfeature17.description: When I restore HP with a spell, I heal the maximum amount instead of rolling the dice

spellAdd: When I use a spell that restores hit points by rolling one or more dice to restore hit points with a spell, I instead use the highest number possible for each die.

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature2.name: Bonus Cantrip
subclassfeature2.description: I know one additional druid cantrip of my choice

subclassfeature2.1.name: Natural Recovery
subclassfeature2.1.description: After a short rest, I can recover a number of 5th-level or lower spell slots

subclassfeature3.name: Circle Spells
subclassfeature3.description: Choose a terrain that grants you spells using the "Choose Feature" button above

arctic.name: Arctic Circle Spells
arctic.description:
My mystical connection to the arctic infuses me with the ability to cast certain spells
   These are always prepared, but don't count against the number of spells I can prepare

coast.name: Coast Circle Spells
coast.description:
My mystical connection to the coast infuses me with the ability to cast certain spells
   These are always prepared, but don't count against the number of spells I can prepare

desert.name: Desert Circle Spells
desert.description:
My mystical connection to the desert infuses me with the ability to cast certain spells
   These are always prepared, but don't count against the number of spells I can prepare

forest.name: Forest Circle Spells
forest.description:
My mystical connection to the forest infuses me with the ability to cast certain spells
   These are always prepared, but don't count against the number of spells I can prepare

grassland.name: Grassland Circle Spells
grassland.description:
My connection to the grassland infuses me with the ability to cast certain spells
   These are always prepared, but don't count against the number of spells I can prepare

mountain.name: Mountain Circle Spells
mountain.description:
My connection to the mountains infuses me with the ability to cast certain spells
   These are always prepared, but don't count against the number of spells I can prepare

swamp.name: Swamp Circle Spells
swamp.description:
My mystical connection to the swamp infuses me with the ability to cast certain spells
   These are always prepared, but don't count against the number of spells I can prepare

underdark.name: Underdark Circle Spells
underdark.description:
My connection to the underdark infuses me with the ability to cast certain spells
   These are always prepared, but don't count against the number of spells I can prepare

subclassfeature6.name: Land's Stride
subclassfeature6.description:
I can travel through nonmagical, difficult terrain without penalty
   I have advantage on saves vs. plants that impede movement by magical influence

subclassfeature10.name: Nature's Ward
subclassfeature10.description: I am immune to poison/disease and I can't be charmed/frightened by elementals or fey

text: Immune to being charmed or frightened by elementals or fey

subclassfeature14.name: Nature's Sanctuary
subclassfeature14.description:
When a beast or plant attacks me, it must make a Wis save or pick a different target
   If it can't, it automatically misses; On a successful save, it is immune for 24 hours

subclassfeature3.name: Improved Critical

atkAdd: My weapon attacks score a critical on a to hit roll of both 19 and 20.

subclassfeature3.description: I score a critical hit with my weapon attacks/Unarmed Strikes on a roll of 19 and 20

subclassfeature3.1.name: Remarkable Athlete
subclassfeature3.1.description:
I have Advantage on Initiative and Strength(Athletics) checks
   On a critical hit, I can move half my Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks

subclassfeature7.name: Additional Fighting Style

fighting style [archery].name: Fighting Style [Archery]
fighting style [archery].description: I gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls I make with Ranged weapons.

atkCalc: My ranged weapons get a +2 bonus on the To Hit.

fighting style [blind fighting].name: Fighting Style [Blind Fighting]
fighting style [blind fighting].description: I have Blindsight with a range of 10 feet.

fighting style [defense].name: Fighting Style [Defense]
fighting style [defense].description: While I'm wearing Light, Medium, or Heavy armor, I gain a +1 bonus to Armor Class.

extraAC.name: Defense Fighting Style
extraAC.text: I gain a +1 bonus to AC while wearing armor.

fighting style [dueling].name: Fighting Style [Dueling]
fighting style [dueling].description: When I'm holding a Melee weapon in one hand and no other weapons, I gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls with that weapon.

atkCalc: When I'm wielding a melee weapon in one hand and no weapon in my other hand, I do +2 damage with that melee weapon. This condition will always be false if the bonus action 'Off-hand Attack' exists.

fighting style [great weapon fighting].name: Fighting Style [Great Weapon Fighting]
fighting style [great weapon fighting].description: When I roll damage for an attack I make with a Melee weapon that I am holding with two hands, I can treat any 1 or 2 on a damage die as a 3. The weapon must have the Two-Handed or Versatile properties to gain this benefit.

atkAdd: While wielding a two-handed or versatile melee weapon in two hands, I can treat a roll of 1 or 2 on any damage die as a 3.

fighting style [interception].name: Fighting Style [Interception]
fighting style [interception].description: When a creature I can see hits another creature within 5 feet of me with an attack roll, I can take a Reaction to reduce the damage dealt to the target by 1d10 plus my Proficiency Bonus. I must be holding a Shield or a Simple or Martial weapon to use this Reaction.

fighting style [protection].name: Fighting Style [Protection]
fighting style [protection].description: When a creature I can see attacks a target other than me that is within 5 feet of me, I can take a Reaction to interpose my Shield if I'm holding one. I impose Disadvantage on the triggering attack roll and all other attack rolls against the target until the start of my next turn if I remain within 5 feet of the target.

fighting style [thrown weapon fighting].name: Fighting Style [Thrown Weapon Fighting]
fighting style [thrown weapon fighting].description: When I hit with a ranged attack roll using a weapon that has the Thrown property, I gain a +2 bonus to the damage roll.

atkAdd: I deal +2 damage when I hit a ranged attack made with a thrown weapon.

fighting style [two-weapon fighting].name: Fighting Style [Two-Weapon Fighting]
fighting style [two-weapon fighting].description: When I make an extra attack as a result of using a weapon that has the Light property, I can add my ability modifier to the damage to that attack if I am not already adding it to the damage.

atkCalc: When engaging in two-weapon fighting, I can add my ability modifier to the damage of my off-hand attacks. If a melee weapon includes 'off-hand' or 'secondary' in its name or description, it is considered an off-hand attack.

fighting style [unarmed fighting].name: Fighting Style [Unarmed Fighting]
fighting style [unarmed fighting].description:
When I hit with my Unarmed Strike and deal damage, I can deal Bludgeoning damage equal to 1d6 plus my Strength modifier instead of the normal damage of an Unarmed Strike. If I am not holding any weapons or a Shield when I make the attack roll, the d6 becomes a d8.
 At the start of each of my turns, I can deal 1d4 Bludgeoning damage to one creature Grappled by me.

atkAdd: My unarmed strikes deal 1d6 damage instead of 1, which increases to 1d8 if I have both hands free to make an unarmed strike with.

subclassfeature7.description: I gain another different Fighting Style feat of my choice.

subclassfeature10.name: Heroic Warrior
subclassfeature10.description: I gain Heroic Inspiration in combat when I start a turn without it

subclassfeature15.name: Superior Critical

atkAdd: My weapon attacks also score a critical on a to hit roll of 18.

subclassfeature15.description: I score a critical hit with my weapon attacks/Unarmed Strikes on a roll of 18, 19, and 20

subclassfeature18.name: Survivor
subclassfeature18.description:
I roll with Advantage on Death Saves and 18-19 counts as a critical success
   At the start of my turn, if I'm not above half or at 0 HP, I regain 5 + Con mod HP

subclassfeature3.name: Hand Technique
subclassfeature3.description:
Whenever I hit a creature with a Flurry of Blows attack I can do one of the following:
   • Have it make a Dexterity save or be knocked prone
   • Have it make a Strength save or be pushed up to 15 ft away from me
   • Stop it from taking reactions until the end of my next turn

subclassfeature6.name: Wholeness of Body
subclassfeature6.description: As an action, I regain hit points equal to three times my monk level

subclassfeature11.name: Tranquility
subclassfeature11.description: After a long rest, I gain the effect of a Sanctuary spell until a next long rest

quivering palm.name: Quivering Palm
quivering palm.description:
[3 ki points]When I hit a creature with an unarmed strike, I can start imperceptible vibrations
   Within my monk level in days, I can use an action to have the creature make a Con save
   If it fails, it is reduced to 0 hit points; If it succeeds, it takes 10d10 necrotic damage

subclassfeature3.name: Channel Divinity: Sacred Weapon
subclassfeature3.description:
As an action, for 1 minute, I add my Cha modifier to hit for one weapon I'm holding
   It also counts as magical and emits bright light in a 20-ft radius and equal dim light

atkCalc: If I include the words 'Sacred Weapon' in the name of a weapon, it gets my Charisma modifier added to its To Hit.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Channel Divinity: Turn the Unholy
subclassfeature3.1.description:
As an action, all fiends/undead within 30 ft that can hear me must make a Wis save
   If one of them fails this save, it is turned for 1 minute or until it takes damage
   Turned: move away, never within 30 ft of me, no reactions or actions other than Dash
   Turned: may Dodge instead of Dash when nowhere to move and unable to escape bonds

subclassfeature7.name: Aura of Devotion
subclassfeature7.description: While I'm conscious, allies within range and I can't be charmed

subclassfeature15.name: Purity of Spirit
subclassfeature15.description: I am always under the effect of a Protection from Evil and Good spell

subclassfeature20.name: Holy Nimbus
subclassfeature20.description:
As an action, I shine with a 30-ft radius bright light and equal dim light for 1 minute
   If an enemy starts its turn in the bright light, it takes 10 radiant damage
   For the duration, I have advantage on saves vs. spells cast by fiends and undead

subclassfeature3.name: Hunter's Lore
subclassfeature3.description:
While a creature is marked by my Hunter's Mark, I know the following about it:
   Damage/condition immunities, damage resistances, and/or damage vulnerabilities.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Hunter's Prey

colossus slayer.name: Colossus Slayer
colossus slayer.description: Once per turn, when I hit a creature with a weapon, I deal an extra 1d8 damage to the target if it's missing any Hit Points. After a Short or Long Rest, I can replace this feature with the 'Horde Breaker' feature.

horde breaker.name: Horde Breaker
horde breaker.description: Once per turn, when I hit a creature, I can make an attack vs. another within 5 ft of it if I haven't hit it during this turn. After a Short or Long Rest, I can replace this feature with the 'Colossus Slayer' feature.

subclassfeature3.1.description: Use the 'choose feature' button to select a Hunter's Prey option, after a Short or Long Rest, I can replace the chosen option with the other one.

subclassfeature7.name: Defensive Tactics

escape the horde.name: Escape the Horde
escape the horde.description: Opportunity Attacks have Disadvantage against me. After a Short or Long Rest, I can replace this feature with the 'Multiattack Defense' feature.

multiattack defense.name: Multiattack Defense
multiattack defense.description: When a creature hits me with an attack roll, that creature has Disadvantage on all other attack rolls against me this turn. After a Short or Long Rest, I can replace this feature with the 'Escape the Horde' feature.

subclassfeature7.description: Use the 'choose feature' button to select a Defensive Tactics option, After a Short or Long Rest, I can replace the chosen option with the other one.

subclassfeature11.name: Superior Hunter's Prey
subclassfeature11.description: Once per turn when I deal damage to a creature marked by my Hunter's mark, I can also deal the extra damage to another creature I can see within 30 feet.

subclassfeature15.name: Superior Hunter's Defense
subclassfeature15.description: When I take damage, I can take a Reaction to give myself Resistance to that damage and any other damage of the same type until the end of the current turn.

subclassfeature3.name: Fast Hands
action: Pick Lock/Disarm Trap/Utilize Item/Activate Magic Item
subclassfeature3.description:
I can do these as a bonus action:
   Sleight of Hand: Make a Dex (Sleight of Hand) check to pick a lock/disarm a trap or pick a pocket.
   Use an Object: Take the Utilize action, or take the Magic action to use a magic item that requires one.

subclassfeature6.name: Second-Story Work
subclassfeature6.description: I gain a Climb Speed equal to my Speed and can determine my jump distance using Dex.

subclassfeature9.name: Supreme Sneak
subclassfeature9.description:
I gain the following Cunning Strike option:
   Stealth Attack (Cost 1d6): This attack doesn't end Hiding if I end the turn behind Three-Quarters or Total Cover.

subclassfeature13.name: Use Magic Device
subclassfeature13.description:
Attunement: I can attune to up to four magic items at once.
   Charges: When I use a magic item property with charges, a 6 on a 1d6 roll means no charges are used.
   Scrolls: I can use any Spell Scroll, using Int as my spellcasting ability. Level 2+ spells require an Int (Arcana) check (DC 10 + Spell Level) to cast or the scroll disintegrates.

subclassfeature17.name: Thief's Reflexes
subclassfeature17.description: I can take two turns during the first round of any combat at my normal Initiative and my second turn at my Initiative - 10.

subclassfeature1.name: Dragon Ancestor
subclassfeature1.description:
Choose a Dragon Ancestor using the "Choose Feature" button above
   When interacting with dragons, if I can add my Proficiency Bonus, I can double it

black dragon ancestor.name: Black Dragon Ancestor
black dragon ancestor.description:
I have draconic ancestry with black dragons, which are affiliated with acid damage
   When interacting with dragons, if I can add my Proficiency Bonus, I can double it

blue dragon ancestor.name: Blue Dragon Ancestor
blue dragon ancestor.description:
I have draconic ancestry with blue dragons, which are affiliated with lightning damage
   When interacting with dragons, if I can add my Proficiency Bonus, I can double it

brass dragon ancestor.name: Brass Dragon Ancestor
brass dragon ancestor.description:
I have draconic ancestry with brass dragons, which are affiliated with fire damage
   When interacting with dragons, if I can add my Proficiency Bonus, I can double it

bronze dragon ancestor.name: Bronze Dragon Ancestor
bronze dragon ancestor.description:
I have draconic ancestry with bronze dragons, which are affiliated with lightning dmg
   When interacting with dragons, if I can add my Proficiency Bonus, I can double it

copper dragon ancestor.name: Copper Dragon Ancestor
copper dragon ancestor.description:
I have draconic ancestry with copper dragons, which are affiliated with acid damage
   When interacting with dragons, if I can add my Proficiency Bonus, I can double it

gold dragon ancestor.name: Gold Dragon Ancestor
gold dragon ancestor.description:
I have draconic ancestry with gold dragons, which are affiliated with fire damage
   When interacting with dragons, if I can add my Proficiency Bonus, I can double it

green dragon ancestor.name: Green Dragon Ancestor
green dragon ancestor.description:
I have draconic ancestry with green dragons, which are affiliated with poison damage
   When interacting with dragons, if I can add my Proficiency Bonus, I can double it

red dragon ancestor.name: Red Dragon Ancestor
red dragon ancestor.description:
I have draconic ancestry with red dragons, which are affiliated with fire damage
   When interacting with dragons, if I can add my Proficiency Bonus, I can double it

silver dragon ancestor.name: Silver Dragon Ancestor
silver dragon ancestor.description:
I have draconic ancestry with silver dragons, which are affiliated with cold damage
   When interacting with dragons, if I can add my Proficiency Bonus, I can double it

white dragon ancestor.name: White Dragon Ancestor
white dragon ancestor.description:
I have draconic ancestry with white dragons, which are affiliated with cold damage
   When interacting with dragons, if I can add my Proficiency Bonus, I can double it

subclassfeature1.1.name: Draconic Resilience
subclassfeature1.1.description:
When I am not wearing armor, my AC is 13 + Dexterity modifier
   My hit point maximum increases by an amount equal to my sorcerer level

subclassfeature6.name: Elemental Affinity
subclassfeature6.description:
Choose a Dragon Ancestor using the "Choose Feature" button above
   I add Cha mod for spell damage if matching my dragon ancestor's affiliated type
   I can spend 1 sorcery point to gain resistance to my dragon ancestor's affiliated type

acid.name: Acid Elemental Affinity
acid.description:
I add my Charisma modifier to one damage roll of a spell if it does acid damage
   When I do this, I can spend 1 sorcery point to gain acid resistance for 1 hour

atkCalc: Cantrips and spells that deal acid damage get my Charisma modifier added to their damage.
spellAdd: Cantrips and spells that deal acid damage get my Charisma modifier added to their damage.

cold.name: Cold Elemental Affinity
cold.description:
I add my Charisma modifier to one damage roll of a spell if it does cold damage
   When I do this, I can spend 1 sorcery point to gain cold resistance for 1 hour

atkCalc: Cantrips and spells that deal cold damage get my Charisma modifier added to their damage.
spellAdd: Cantrips and spells that deal cold damage get my Charisma modifier added to their damage.

fire.name: Fire Elemental Affinity
fire.description:
I add my Charisma modifier to one damage roll of a spell if it does fire damage
   When I do this, I can spend 1 sorcery point to gain fire resistance for 1 hour

atkCalc: Cantrips and spells that deal fire damage get my Charisma modifier added to their damage.
spellAdd: Cantrips and spells that deal fire damage get my Charisma modifier added to their damage.

lightning.name: Lightning Elemental Affinity
lightning.description:
I add my Charisma modifier to one damage roll of a spell if it does lightning damage
   When I do this, I can spend 1 sorcery point to gain lightning resistance for 1 hour

atkCalc: Cantrips and spells that deal lightning damage get my Charisma modifier added to their damage.
spellAdd: Cantrips and spells that deal lightning damage get my Charisma modifier added to their damage.

poison.name: Poison Elemental Affinity
poison.description:
I add my Charisma modifier to one damage roll of a spell if it does poison damage
   When I do this, I can spend 1 sorcery point to gain poison resistance for 1 hour

atkCalc: Cantrips and spells that deal poison damage get my Charisma modifier added to their damage.
spellAdd: Cantrips and spells that deal poison damage get my Charisma modifier added to their damage.

subclassfeature14.name: Dragon Wings
subclassfeature14.description:
As a bonus action, unless armor is in the way, I can sprout dragon wings from my back
   I gain a fly speed equal to my current speed until I dismiss the wings as a bonus action

subclassfeature18.name: Draconic Presence
subclassfeature18.description:
As an action, I create 60-ft radius aura of awe/fear for concentration up to 1 minute
   All hostiles in this aura must make a Wis save or be charmed (awe) or frightened (fear)
   They make their saves at the beginning of their turns
   A creature that succeeds on the save is immune to my aura for 24 hours

subclassfeature3.name: Dark One's Blessing
subclassfeature3.description: When I reduce a hostile to 0 HP, I gain Cha mod + Warlock level temp HP (min 1). I also gain this temp HP if an enemy within 10 ft of me is reduced to 0 Hit Points.

subclassfeature6.name: Dark One's Own Luck
subclassfeature6.description: Once per roll, when I make an ability check or saving throw, I can add 1d10 after rolling the d20 but before any of the roll's effects occur.

subclassfeature10.name: Fiendish Resilience
subclassfeature10.description: At the end of a Rest, I can choose a damage type (not Force) to be Resistant to until I choose another.

subclassfeature14.name: Hurl Through Hell
subclassfeature14.description: Once per turn when I hit a creature with an attack roll I can force it to make a Cha save, or it is Incapacitated and disappears into the Lower Planes until the end of my next turn. When it returns it takes 8d10 Psychic damage if it isn't a Fiend. This Feature can be used 1/LR unless I expend a Warlock SS to regain use of it.

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature2.name: Evocation Savant
subclassfeature2.description: I halve the gp and time needed to copy evocation spells into my spellbook

subclassfeature2.1.name: Sculpt Spells
subclassfeature2.1.description:
If I cast an evocation spell affecting others I can see, I can protect 1 + the spell's level
   The chosen automatically succeed on their saving throws vs. the spell
   They also take no damage if the spell would normally deal half damage on a save

subclassfeature6.name: Potent Cantrip
subclassfeature6.description: Any cantrips I cast still deal half damage on a successful save

atkAdd: My cantrips still do half damage on a successful saving throw, but none of their other effects.
spellAdd: My cantrips still do half damage on a successful saving throw, but none of their other effects.

subclassfeature10.name: Empowered Evocation
subclassfeature10.description: I can add my Int modifier to a single damage roll of any wizard evocation spell I cast

atkCalc: I add my Intelligence modifier to a single damage roll of any wizard evocation spell I cast.
spellAdd: I add my Intelligence modifier to a single damage roll of any wizard evocation spell I cast.

subclassfeature14.name: Overchannel
subclassfeature14.description:
When I cast a 5th-level or lower wizard spell that damages, it can deal max damage
   Except the first time I do this after a long rest, I suffer 2d12 necrotic dmg per spell lvl
   Every time I do it after that, before a long rest, I take another 1d12 necrotic damage
   This necrotic damage surpasses my resistances/immunities; I can't overchannel cantrips

subclassfeature3.name: Frenzy
subclassfeature3.description:
As a bonus action each turn while raging, I can make a melee attack
   After my rage is over, I suffer one level of exhaustion

subclassfeature6.name: Mindless Rage
subclassfeature6.description: While raging, I can't be charmed or frightened, and such effects are suspended

subclassfeature10.name: Intimidating Presence
subclassfeature10.description:
As an action, frighten one creature in 30 ft for one turn if it fails a Wisdom save
   This effect ends if the creature is out of line of sight or more than 60 ft away
   If a creature succeeds its saving throw, it is immune for 24 hours

subclassfeature14.name: Retaliation
subclassfeature14.description: When an enemy within 5 ft damages me, I can make a melee attack as a reaction

subclassfeature3.name: Animal Speaker
subclassfeature3.description: Cast *Beast Sense* and *Speak with Animals* as Rituals using Wisdom.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Rage of the Wilds
subclassfeature3.1.description: Choose a Rage of the Wilds animal aspect when I enter a Rage (See Third Page).

bear.name: Bear
bear.description: Resistance to all but Force, Necrotic, Psychic, and Radiant damage.

eagle.name: Eagle
eagle.description: Disengage and Dash as a Bonus Action.

wolf.name: Wolf
wolf.description: Allies have Advantage on attacks against enemies within 5 feet of me.

subclassfeature6.name: Aspect of the Wilds

owl.name: Owl
owl.description: I have Darkvision with a range of 60 feet. If I already have Darkvision, its range increases by 60 feet.

panther.name: Panther
panther.description: I have a Climb Speed equal to my Speed

salmon.name: Salmon
salmon.description: I have a Swim Speed equal to my Speed

subclassfeature6.description: Use 'Choose Feature' button to choose an Aspect of the Wilds. Whenever I finish a Long Rest, I can change my choice.

subclassfeature10.name: Nature Speaker
subclassfeature10.description: I can cast the Commune with Nature spell but only as a Ritual. Wisdom is my spellcasting ability for it.

subclassfeature14.name: Power of the Wilds
subclassfeature14.description: When I enter a Rage, I gain the Benefits of an animal aspect from the Rage of the Wilds Feature and one animal aspect from this Feature (See Third Page).

falcon.name: Falcon
falcon.description: Fly Speed equals my Speed without armor.

lion.name: Lion
lion.description: Enemies with in 5 ft of me have Disadvantage on attacks against targets other than me or another Barbarian w/ this feature.

ram.name: Ram
ram.description: Knock Large or smaller creatures Prone when hit with melee attack.

subclassfeature3.name: Vitality of the Tree
subclassfeature3.description:
Vitality Surge : Gain Temporary Hit Points equal to my Barbarian level when I Rage.
   Life-Giving Force : Each turn, give a nearby creature Temporary Hit Points by rolling d6s equal to my Rage Damage bonus. All vanish when rage ends.

subclassfeature6.name: Branches of the Tree
subclassfeature6.description: As a Reaction, force a creature within 30 feet to make a Strength save (DC 8 + Strength mod + Proficiency), or be teleported to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of me and reduce its Speed to 0 until the end of the turn.

subclassfeature10.name: Battering Roots
subclassfeature10.description: Extend reach by 10 feet with Heavy or Versatile weapons. Use Push or Topple mastery properties when hitting with such weapons in addition to a different property.

subclassfeature14.name: Travel Along the Tree
subclassfeature14.description: Teleport up to 60 feet as a Bonus Action while Raging. Once per Rage, extend range to 150 feet and bring up to six creatures within 10 feet.

subclassfeature3.name: Divine Fury
subclassfeature3.description:
While raging, the first creature I hit with a weapon attack in my turn gets extra damage
   This is necrotic or radiant damage equal to 1d6 + half my barbarian level
   Choose a damage type using the "Choose Feature" button above

necrotic damage.name: Divine Fury
necrotic damage.description:
While raging, the first creature I hit with a weapon attack in my turn gets extra damage
   It takes an extra 1d6 + half my barbarian level worth of necrotic damage

radiant damage.name: Divine Fury
radiant damage.description:
While raging, the first creature I hit with a weapon attack in my turn gets extra damage
   It takes an extra 1d6 + half my barbarian level worth of radiant damage

atkAdd: If I include the word 'Rage' in a melee weapon's name, it will show in its description that its first hit does extra damage.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Warrior of the Gods
subclassfeature3.1.description: Spells restoring me to life (not undeath or anything else) don't require material comp.

subclassfeature6.name: Fanatical Focus
subclassfeature6.description:
When I fail a saving throw while raging, I can reroll it and must use the new roll
   I can use this ability only once per rage

subclassfeature10.name: Zealous Presence
subclassfeature10.description:
As a bonus action, I choose up to 10 creatures within 60 ft that can hear my battle cry
   These creatures gain adv. on attacks and saves until the start of my next turn

subclassfeature14.name: Rage Beyond Death
subclassfeature14.description:
While raging, having 0 hit points doesn't knock me unconscious
   I still must make death saves, and I suffer the normal effects of taking damage
   I only die due to failed death saves if my rage ends while I'm at 0 HP

subclassfeature3.name: Dazzling Footwork

atkAdd: I can use either Strength or Dexterity and my Bardic Inspiration damage die in place of the normal damage die for any unarmed strike.

subclassfeature3.description:
While I'm not wearing armor or wielding a Shield, I gain the following benefits:
   Dance Virtuoso: I have Adv on Cha (Performance) checks I make that involve me dancing.
   Unarmored Defense: My base Armor Class is 10 + Dex mod + Cha mod.
   Agile Strikes: When I spend a BI as part of an action/Bonus Action/Reaction I can make an Unarmed Strike as part of it.
   Bardic Damage: My Unarmed Strikes can use Dex instead of Str. Unarmed Strike can deal Blud damage (BI die + Dex mod) instead of normal. This doesn't spend the die.

subclassfeature6.name: Inspiring Movement
subclassfeature6.description:
Spend one BI as a Reaction when an enemy I can see ends its turn within 5 ft of me to move up to half my Speed. An ally of my choice within 30 feet can also gain this benefit.
   None of this feature's movement provokes Opportunity Attacks.

subclassfeature6.1.name: Tandem Footwork
subclassfeature6.1.description: If I'm not Incapacitated when I roll Initiative I can roll one BI die. Each ally within 30 ft who can see or hear me adds the BI roll as a bonus to their Initative.

subclassfeature14.name: Leading Evasion
subclassfeature14.description: Unless Incapacitated, when making a Dex save to take only half damage, myself and allies within 5 ft take no damage on a success & half on a fail.

subclassfeature3.name: Beguiling Magic
subclassfeature3.description:
I always have Charm Person and Mirror Image prepared.
   After I cast an Ench or Illus spell with a spell slot, I can force a Wis save on a creature I can see within 60 ft On a fail the target is Charmed OR Frightened for 1 min. It repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.
   I can spend one Bardic Inspiration (no action) or Long Rest to restore this feature.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Mantle of Inspiration
subclassfeature3.1.description: As a Bonus Action up to my Cha mod (min 1) creatures within 60 feet gain [2 x one BI die roll] Temp HP and can move up to its Speed as a Reaction w/out Opportunity Attacks.

subclassfeature6.name: Mantle of Majesty
subclassfeature6.description:
I always have Command prepared.
   As a bonus action, I can appear unearthly up to 1 min; At the same time & during this I can cast Command without spell slots; Creatures charmed by me automatically fail.
   I can restore it by spending a level 3+ spell slot (no action) or finish a Long Rest.

subclassfeature14.name: Unbreakable Majesty
subclassfeature14.description: Once per rest as a Bonus Action for 1 min or until Incapacitated, when a creature attacks & hits me for the first time on a turn it must succeed a Cha save or miss.

subclassfeature3.name: Bonus Proficiencies
subclassfeature3.description: I gain proficiency with three skills.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Cutting Words
subclassfeature3.1.description: When a creature I can see within 60 ft rolls for damage, passes a check, or attacks, I can take a Reaction to spend BI die; Subtract the number rolled from the creature's roll.

subclassfeature6.name: Magical Discoveries
subclassfeature6.description:
Learn two spells from the Cleric, Druid, or Wizard spell lists. They're always prepared.
   When I gain a Bard level I can replace one spell with another that I have slots for.

subclassfeature14.name: Peerless Skill
subclassfeature14.description: When I fail a check/attack I can roll one BI die & add it. The BI isn't spent on a fail.

subclassfeature3.name: Combat Inspiration
subclassfeature3.description:
A creature with a BI die from me can use it for one of the following:
   Defense: When hit by an attack it can roll the BI die as a Reaction & add it to its AC.
   Offense: When it hits with an attack it can roll the BI die & add it to the damage.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Martial Training
subclassfeature3.1.description:
I gain proficiency with Martial weapons & training with Medium armor & Shields.
   I can use a Simple/Martial weapon as a Spellcasting Focus to cast my Bard Spells.

subclassfeature6.name: Extra Attack
subclassfeature6.description:
I can attack twice instead of once when I Attack on my turn.
   I can cast a cantrip that has a casting time of an action in place of one of those attacks.

subclassfeature14.name: Battle Magic
subclassfeature14.description: After I cast a spell that takes an action, I can make a weapon attack as a Bonus Action.

subclassfeature3.name: Disciple of Life
subclassfeature3.description: When I cast a spell with a spell slot that gives HP it gives addtl 2 + slot level HP.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Channel Divinity: Preserve Life
subclassfeature3.1.description: As a Magic action I restore 5 x my Cleric level HP, divided among Bloodied creatures I choose within 30 ft, up to half their max HP.

subclassfeature6.name: Blessed Healer
subclassfeature6.description: When I restore HP with a spell slot to another creature(s), I regain 2 + slot level HP.

subclassfeature17.name: Supreme Healing
subclassfeature17.description: I can heal max HP when I would roll to restore HP with a spell or Channel Divinity.

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature3.name: Channel Divinity: Radiance of Dawn
subclassfeature3.description: As a Magic action I dispel magical Darkness w/in 30 ft Each creature of my choice in that area must pass a Con save for half damage or take Radiant damage.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Warding Flare
subclassfeature3.1.description: When a creature I can see w/in 30 feet makes an attack roll I can impose Disadv as a reaction.

subclassfeature6.name: Improved Warding Flare
subclassfeature6.description: I regain all uses of Warding Flare when I finish a rest. When I use it I can give the target of the attack 2d6 + my Wis mod Temp HP.

subclassfeature17.name: Corona of Light
subclassfeature17.description: As a Magic action, I can emit Bright Light in a 60-ft radius and Dim Light for an addtl 30 ft (sunlight) for 1 min or until dismissed (no action). Foes in the Bright Light have Disadv on saves against my Radiance of the Dawn & Fire or Radiant spell damage.

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature3.name: Blessing of the Trickster
subclassfeature3.description: As a Magic action I can give a willing creature w/in 30 ft or myself Adv on Dex (Stealth) checks until I finish a Long Rest or use this again.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Channel Divinity: Invoke Duplicity
subclassfeature3.1.description:
As a Bonus Action I can create an animated intangible illusory double of myself in an empty space w/in 30 ft for 1 min, until dismissed (no action), or I'm Incapacitated; it doesn't occupy its space. While active I have these benefits:
   Cast Spells: I can cast spells through my double but must use my own senses.
   Distract: I have Adv on Attack rolls against creatures w/in 5 ft of my double & I.
   Move: As a Bonus Action I can move my double up to 30 ft to an empty space w/in 120 ft of me.

subclassfeature6.name: Trickster's Transposition
subclassfeature6.description: When I use a Bonus Action to create or move my double I can swap places with it.

subclassfeature17.name: Improved Duplicity
subclassfeature17.description:
My Invoke Duplicity illusion has grown more powerful:
   Shared Distraction: Allies & I have Adv on attacks vs creatures w/in 5 ft of the double.
   Healing Illusion: When the illusion ends I choose a creature w/in 5 feet of it or myself to regain my Cleric level HP.

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature3.name: Channel Divinity: Guided Strikes
subclassfeature3.description: I can give a +10 bonus when a creature within 300 ft (Reaction) or I (no action) miss an attack roll.

subclassfeature3.1.name: War Priest
subclassfeature3.1.description: As a Bonus Action, I can make one attack with a weapon or an Unarmed Strike.

subclassfeature6.name: Channel Divinity: War God's Blessing
subclassfeature6.description: I can cast Shield of Faith or Spiritual Weapon without a spell slot or Conc; it lasts 1 min, until I cast it again, become Incapacitated, or die.

subclassfeature14.name: Avatar of Battle
subclassfeature14.description: I gain Resistance to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage.

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature3.name: Circle of the Land Spells

arid land.name: Arid Land
arid land.description: Whenever I finish a Long Rest, choose one type of land; arid, polar, temperate, or tropical. I have certain spells prepared based on the land chosen.

polar land.name: Polar Land
polar land.description: Whenever I finish a Long Rest, choose one type of land; arid, polar, temperate, or tropical. I have certain spells prepared based on the land chosen.

temperate land.name: Temperate Land
temperate land.description: Whenever I finish a Long Rest, choose one type of land; arid, polar, temperate, or tropical. I have certain spells prepared based on the land chosen.

tropical land.name: Tropical Land
tropical land.description: Whenever I finish a Long Rest, choose one type of land; arid, polar, temperate, or tropical. I have certain spells prepared based on the land chosen.

subclassfeature3.description: Whenever I finish a Long Rest, choose one type of land; arid, polar, temperate, or tropical. I have certain spells prepared based on the land chosen.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Land's Aid
subclassfeature3.1.description: As a Magic action, expend a Wild Shape use to create a 10-foot sphere within 60 feet. Chosen creatures in the sphere make a Constitution save against my spell DC, taking a number of d6s Necrotic damage (half on success). One creature in the area regains the same number of d6s HP.

subclassfeature6.name: Natural Recovery
subclassfeature6.description: Once per long rest, cast a prepared circle spell (level 1+) without using a spell slot. After a short rest, recover expended spell slots totaling up to half my druid level (rounded up, max 5th level).

subclassfeature10.name: Nature's Ward

arid land.name: Arid Land
arid land.description: I am immune to the Poisoned condition, and have damage resistance associated with my current land choice.[Fire]

polar land.name: Polar Land
polar land.description: I am immune to the Poisoned condition, and have damage resistance associated with my current land choice.[Cold]

temperate land.name: Temperate Land
temperate land.description: I am immune to the Poisoned condition, and have damage resistance associated with my current land choice.[Lightning]

tropical land.name: Tropical Land
tropical land.description: I am immune to the Poisoned condition, and have damage resistance associated with my current land choice.[Poison]

subclassfeature10.description: I am immune to the Poisoned condition, and have damage resistance associated with my current land choice.

subclassfeature14.name: Nature's Sanctuary
subclassfeature14.description: As a Magic action, I can use my Wild Shape to create a 15-foot cube within 120 feet. It lasts for 1 minute or until I'm incapacitated or die. In this area, my allies and I have Half Cover, and my allies gain the current Resistance from my Nature's Ward. As a Bonus Action, move the cube up to 60 feet within 120 feet

subclassfeature3.name: Circle Forms
subclassfeature3.description: In Wild Shape: My maximum form's Challenge Rating is my Druid level divided by 3. My AC becomes greatest of 13 plus my Wisdom modifier or the Beast's AC. I also gain Temporary Hit Points equal to three times my Druid level.

wild shape.name: Wild Shape
wild shape.description:
As a bonus action, I assume the shape of a beast I have seen before with these rules:
    • I gain all its game statistics except Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma
    • I get its skill/saving throw prof. while keeping my own, using whichever is higher
    • I gain three times my Druid level Temp HP
    • I can't cast spells in beast form, but transforming doesn't break concentration
    • I retain my HP, hit dice, class features, feats and creature type
    • I can choose whether equipment falls to the ground, merges, or stays worn
    • I revert if out of time or Incapacitated; I die, or I end it as a Bonus Action

subclassfeature6.name: Improved Circle Forms
subclassfeature6.description: In Wild Shape, I can choose to deal Radiant damage with my attacks. I also add my Wisdom modifier to Constitution saving throws.

subclassfeature10.name: Moonlight Step
subclassfeature10.description:
As a Bonus Action, I can teleport up to 30 feet and gain Advantage on my next attack roll this turn.
   I can do this a number of times per long rest equal to my Wisdom modifier or by expending a level 2+ spell slot.

subclassfeature14.name: Lunar Form
subclassfeature14.description:
Once per turn, I can deal an extra 2d10 Radiant damage with a Wild Shape attack.
   When using Moonlight Step, I can also teleport one willing creature within 10 feet to a space within 10 feet of my destination.

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature3.name: Wrath of the Sea
subclassfeature3.description:
As a Bonus Action, I can use my Wild Shape to create a 5-foot ocean spray around me for 10 minutes.
   Each turn, I can target a creature in the spray, forcing a Constitution save or dealing WIS * d6 Cold damage and pushing it 15 feet away.

subclassfeature6.name: Aquatic Affinity
subclassfeature6.description: My ocean spray increases to a 10-foot radius, and I gain a Swim Speed equal to my walking Speed.

subclassfeature10.name: Stormborn
subclassfeature10.description: While my ocean spray is active, I gain a Fly Speed equal to my walking Speed and Resistance to Cold, Lightning, and Thunder damage

subclassfeature14.name: Oceanic Gift
subclassfeature14.description: I can manifest my ocean spray around another willing creature within 60 feet. By expending two uses of Wild Shape, I can cover both myself and the other creature with the spray.

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature3.name: Star Map
subclassfeature3.description:
I've created a star map, a Tiny object which i can use as my spellcasting focus.
   If I lose it, I can recreate the map during a Short or Long Rest.
   While holding it, I know the Guidance cantrip and always have Guiding Bolt prepared.
   I can cast Guiding Bolt without expending a spell slot, up to my Wisdom modifier times per long rest.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Starry Form
subclassfeature3.1.description:
As a bonus action, I can expend a use of wild shape to take on a starry form for 10 min
   In that form I become luminous and shed bright light in a 10-ft radius and dim light for an extra 10-ft radius
   When I do so, I choose one constellation that glimmers on my body, granting me benefits
   See the 3rd page's "Notes" section for the benefits of the possible constellations

archer constellation.name: Archer Constellation
archer constellation.description: As a bonus action, I can make a ranged spell attack to hurl a luminous arrow 60 ft

chalice constellation.name: Chalice Constellation
chalice constellation.description: When I cast a healing spell with a spell slot, I can heal myself or another within 30 ft of me

dragon constellation.name: Dragon Constellation
dragon constellation.description:
I can treat a roll below 10 as a 10 for Int/Wis/Con checks and saves to maintain concentration
   From 10th-level onwards, I also gain a flying speed of 20 ft and can hover

subclassfeature6.name: Cosmic Omen
subclassfeature6.description:
When I finish a long rest, I roll a die to gain an omen based on the result (odd/even)
   As a reaction when a creature I can see in 30 ft makes an D20 Test, I can:
    • Weal (even): add 1d6 to the number rolled to the total
    • Woe (odd): subtract 1d6 from the number rolled to the total

subclassfeature10.name: Twinkling Constellations
subclassfeature10.description:
While in my starry form, I can change the constellation at the start of each of my turns
   The benefit of my constellations improve, see the 3rd page's "Notes" section

subclassfeature14.name: Full of Stars
subclassfeature14.description: while in starry form, I gain Resistance to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage.

subclassfeature3.name: Combat Superiority
subclassfeature3.description:
I gain superiority dice (SD) that I can use to fuel special Maneuvers
   One maneuver per attack. I regain all SD after a short rest

ambush.name: Ambush
ambush.description: When I make a Dexterity (Stealth) check or an Initiative roll, I can expend one Superiority Die and add the die to the roll, unless I have the Incapacitated condition.

bait and switch.name: Bait and Switch
bait and switch.description:
When I'm within 5 feet of a creature on my turn, I can expend one Superiority Die and switch places with that creature, provided I spend at least 5 feet of movement and the creature is willing and doesn't have the Incapacitated condition. This movement doesn't provoke Opportunity Attacks.
   Roll the Superiority Die. Until the Start of my next turn, I or the other creature (my choice) gains a bonus to AC equal to the number rolled.

commander's strike.name: Commander's Strike
commander's strike.description: When I take the Attack action on my turn, I can replace one of my attacks to direct one of my companions to strike. When I do so, choose a willing creature who can see or hear I and expend one Superiority Die. That creature can immediately use its Reaction to make one attack with a weapon or an Unarmed Strike, adding the Superiority Die to the attack's damage roll on a hit.

commanding presence.name: Commanding presence
commanding presence.description: When I make a Charisma (Intimidation, Performance, or Persuasion) check, I can expend one Superiority Die and add that die to the roll.

disarming attack.name: Disarming Attack
disarming attack.description: When I hit a creature with an attack roll, I can expend one Superiority Die to attempt to disarm the target. Add the Superiority Die roll to the attack's damage roll. The target must succeed on a Strength saving throw or drop one object of my choice that it's holding with the object landing in its space.

distracting strike.name: Distracting Strike
distracting strike.description: When I hit a creature with an attack roll, I can expend one Superiority Die to distract the target. Add the Superiority Die roll to the attack's damage roll. The next attack roll against the target by an attacker other than myself has Advantage if the attack is made before the start of my next turn.

evasive footwork.name: evasive footwork
evasive footwork.description: As a Bonus Action, I can expend one Superiority Die and take the Disengage action. I also roll the die and add the number rolled to my AC until the start of my next turn.

feinting attack.name: Feinting Attack
feinting attack.description: As a Bonus Action, I can expend one Superiority Die to feint, choosing one creature within 5 feet of me as my target. I have Advantage on my next attack roll against that target this turn. If that attack hits, add the Superiority Die to the attack's damage roll.

goading attack.name: Goading Attack
goading attack.description: When I hit a creature with an attack roll, I can expend one Superiority Die to attempt to goad the target into attacking I. Add the Superiority Die to the attack's damage roll. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have Disadvantage on attack rolls against the targets other than I until the end of my next turn.

lunging attack.name: Lunging Attack
lunging attack.description: As a Bonus Action, I can expend one Superiority Die and take the Dash action. If I move at least 5 feet in a straight line immediately before hitting with a melee attack as part of the Attack action on this turn, I can add the Superiority Die to the attack's damage roll.

maneuvering attack.name: Maneuvering Attack
maneuvering attack.description: When I hit a creature with an attack roll, I can expend one Superiority Die to maneuver one of my comrades into another position. Add the Superiority Die roll to the attack's damage roll, and choose a willing creature who can see or hear I. That creature can use its Reaction to move up to half its Speed without provoking an Opportunity Attack from the target of my attack.

menacing attack.name: Menacing Attack
menacing attack.description: When I hit a creature with an attack roll, I can expend one Superiority Die to attempt to frighten the target. Add the Superiority Due to the attack's damage roll. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the Frightened condition until the end of my next turn.

parry.name: Parry
parry.description: When another creature damages I with a melee attack roll, I can take a Reaction and expend one Superiority Die to reduce the damage by the number I roll on my Superiority Die plus I Strength or Dexterity modifier (my choice).

precision attack.name: Precision Attack
precision attack.description: When I miss with an attack roll, I can expend one Superiority Die, roll that die, and add it to the attack roll, potentially causing the attack to hit.

pushing attack.name: Pushing Attack
pushing attack.description: When I hit a creature with an attack roll using a weapon or an Unarmed Strike, I can expend one Superiority Die to attempt to drive the target back. Add the Superiority Die to the attack's damage roll. If the target is Large or smaller, it must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 15 feet directly away from I.

rally.name: Rally
rally.description: As a Bonus Action, I can expend one Superiority Die to bolster the resolve of a companion. Choose an ally within 30 feet of who can see or hear me. That creature gains Temporary Hit Points equal to the Superiority Die roll plus half my Fighter level (round down).

riposte.name: Riposte
riposte.description: When a creature misses me with a melee attack roll, I can take a Reaction and expend one Superiority Die to make a melee attack roll with a weapon or an Unarmed Strike against the creature. If I hit, add the Superiority Die to the attack's damage.

sweeping attack.name: Sweeping Attack
sweeping attack.description: When I hit a creature with a melee attack roll using a weapon or an Unarmed Strike, I can expend one Superiority Die to attempt to damage another creature. Choose another creature within 5 feet of the original target, within my reach. If the original attack roll would hit the second creature, it takes damage equal to the number I rolled on my Superiority Die. The damage is of the same type dealt by the original attack.

tactical assessment.name: Tactical Assessment
tactical assessment.description: When I make an Intelligence (History or Investigation) check or a Wisdom (Insight) check, I can expend one Superiority Die and add that die to the ability check.

trip attack.name: Trip Attack
trip attack.description: When I hit a creature with an attack roll using a weapon or an Unarmed Strike, I can expend one Superiority Die and add the die to the attack's damage roll. If the target is Large or smaller it must succeed on a Strength saving throw or have the Prone condition.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Student of War
skillstxt: I gain 1 additional Fighter skill of choice.
subclassfeature3.1.description: Gain proficiency with one level 1 Fighter skill and one artisan's tool set

subclassfeature7.name: Know Your Enemy
subclassfeature7.description:
As a Bonus Action, observe any Immunities/Resistances/Vulnerabilities of a creature within 30 ft
   I have 1 use per long rest unless I spend a SD (no action) to restore this feature

subclassfeature15.name: Relentless
subclassfeature15.description: When I use a maneuver, I can roll 1d8 once per turn instead of spending a SD

subclassfeature3.name: Improved Critical
subclassfeature3.description: I score a critical hit with my weapon attacks on a roll of 19 and 20

atkAdd: My weapon attacks score a critical on a to hit roll of both 19 and 20.

subclassfeature7.name: Remarkable Athlete
subclassfeature7.description:
I add half my Proficiency Bonus to Str/Dex/Con checks if I would otherwise add none
   When making running long jumps, I add my Strength modifier to the distance in feet

subclassfeature10.name: Additional Fighting Style
subclassfeature10.description: Choose an Additional Fighting Style using the "Choose Feature" button above

archery.name: Archery Fighting Style
archery.description: +2 bonus to attack rolls I make with ranged weapons

atkCalc: My ranged weapons get a +2 bonus on the To Hit.

defense.name: Defense Fighting Style
defense.description: +1 bonus to AC when I'm wearing armor

extraAC.name: Defense Fighting Style
extraAC.text: I gain a +1 bonus to AC while wearing armor.

dueling.name: Dueling Fighting Style
dueling.description: +2 to damage rolls when wielding a melee weapon in one hand and no other weapons

atkCalc: When I'm wielding a melee weapon in one hand and no weapon in my other hand, I do +2 damage with that melee weapon. This condition will always be false if the bonus action 'Off-hand Attack' exists.

great weapon fighting.name: Great Weapon Fighting Style
great weapon fighting.description: Reroll 1 or 2 on damage if wielding two-handed/versatile melee weapon in both hands

atkAdd: While wielding a two-handed or versatile melee weapon in two hands, I can re-roll a 1 or 2 on any damage die once.

protection.name: Protection Fighting Style
protection.description:
As a reaction, I can give disadv. on an attack made vs. someone within 5 ft of me
   I need to be wielding a shield and be able to see the attacker to do this

two-weapon fighting.name: Two-Weapon Fighting Style
two-weapon fighting.description: I can add my ability modifier to the damage of my off-hand attacks

atkCalc: When engaging in two-weapon fighting, I can add my ability modifier to the damage of my off-hand attacks. If a melee weapon includes 'off-hand' or 'secondary' in its name or description, it is considered an off-hand attack.

subclassfeature15.name: Superior Critical
subclassfeature15.description: I score a critical hit with my weapon attacks on a roll of 18, 19, and 20

atkAdd: My weapon attacks also score a critical on a to hit roll of 18.

subclassfeature18.name: Survivor
subclassfeature18.description: At the start of my turn, if I'm not above half or at 0 HP, I regain 5 + Con mod HP

subclassfeature3.name: Spellcasting
subclassfeature3.description:
I can cast known wizard cantrips/spells, using Intelligence as my spellcasting ability
   When I gain a Fighter level, I can replace one spell. I can use an Arcane Focus

subclassfeature3.1.name: War Bond
subclassfeature3.1.description:
During a 1 hour ritual or short rest, I can bind one weapon I touch
   I can’t be disarmed of it unless I'm Incapacitated. I can summon it as a Bonus Action

subclassfeature7.name: War Magic
subclassfeature7.description: When I use my Attack action, I can replace an attack with a Wizard cantrip of 1 action

subclassfeature10.name: Eldritch Strike
subclassfeature10.description: On a weapon hit, the creature has disadv. on my spell save until the end of my next turn

subclassfeature15.name: Arcane Charge
subclassfeature15.description:
When I use Action Surge, I can also teleport up to 30ft to an unoccupied space I see
   I can do so before or after the extra action

subclassfeature18.name: Improved War Magic
subclassfeature18.description:
When I use my Attack action on my turn, I can replace two of my attacks with a
   level 1 or 2 Wizard spell with the casting time of an action.

subclassfeature3.name: Psionic Power
subclassfeature3.description:
I gain twice my proficiency bonus of psionic energy dice (PsiD) that fuel my psionics
   I regain one PsiD after a short rest and all after a long rest
   Protective Field: When I or a creature I see within 30ft is hit, as a Reaction I can
   reduce the damage by rolling one PsiD + Int mod (min 1)
   Psionic Strike: Once on my turn after I damage a target with a weapon
   I can spend a PsiD to deal the roll + Int mod extra force damage
   Telekinetic Movement: as a magic action, I can move a Large/smaller loose object or one
   willing creature to an unoccupied space I can see (range 30ft). If it's Tiny, I can move it to
   or from my hand. 1 free use per short/long rest unless I spend a PsiD to restore my use

subclassfeature7.name: Telekinetic Adept
subclassfeature7.description:
Psi-Powered Leap: As a Bonus Action, gain a flying speed equal to twice my speed until
   the turn ends. 1 free use per short/long rest unless I spend a PsiD to restore my use
   Telekinetic Thrust: If I deal damage with my Psionic Strike, I can force a Str save
   On a fail: target knocked prone or moved up to 10ft in any direction horizontally

subclassfeature10.name: Guarded Mind
subclassfeature10.description:
I am Resistant to Psychic damage. If I start my turn Charmed/Frightened, I can
   spend a PsiD (no action) to cure it/both conditions

subclassfeature15.name: Bulwark of Force
subclassfeature15.description:
As a Bonus Action, I can choose up to Int mod of creatures (min 1) I see in 30ft
   (can be me), each gains Half Cover (duration 1 min) or until I'm Incapapacitated
   1 free use per long rest unless I spend a PsiD to restore my use

subclassfeature18.name: Telekinetic Master
subclassfeature18.description:
I can cast Telekinesis, without spell slots/components, with Int spellcasting ability
   While concentrating on this spell, as a Bonus Action, I can make one weapon attack
   1 free use per long rest unless I spend a PsiD to restore my use

subclassfeature3.name: Hand of Harm
subclassfeature3.description:
1/turn when I hit a crea. with an Unarmed Strike and deal dmg
   1 FP to add extra Necro. dmg equal to one roll of my Martial Arts die + Wis mod.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Hand of Healing
subclassfeature3.1.description:
As a Magic action, 1 FP to touch a crea. and restore HP equal to a roll of my Martial Arts die + Wis mod.
   When I use Flurry of Blows, I can replace one of the Unarmed Strikes with a use of this feature without expending FP for the healing.

subclassfeature3.2.name: Implements of Mercy
subclassfeature3.2.description: I gain Proficiency in the Insight and Medicine skills and proficiency with the Herbalism Kit.

subclassfeature6.name: Physician's Touch
subclassfeature6.description:
Hand of Healing also ends 1 condition blinded, deafened, paralyzed, poisoned or stunned
   Hand of Harm also causes the target to be poisoned until the end of my next turn

subclassfeature11.name: Flurry of Healing and Harm
subclassfeature11.description:
I can use Hand of Healing instead of each Flurry of Blows unarmed strike without ki cost
   I can use Hand of Harm on one Flurry of Blows unarmed strike without ki cost
   I can use this benefit a number of times equal to my Wis Mod, and can't do so again until a Long Rest.

hand of ultimate mercy.name: Hand of Ultimate Mercy
hand of ultimate mercy.description:
As an action, I can spend 5 FP and touch a creature that died in the last 24 hours
   The creature returns to life and regains 4d10 + my Wisdom modifier in hit points
   It is also cured of all these conditions: blinded, deafened, paralyzed, poisoned, and stunned

subclassfeature3.name: Shadow Arts

darkness.name: Darkness
darkness.description: Darkness : I can expend 1 Focus Point to cast the Darkness spell without expending components. I can see within the spell's area when I cast it with this feature. While the spell persists, I can move its area of Darkness to a space within 60 feet of myself at the start of each of my turns.

darkness.changes: Spells cast with my Shadow Arts don't require spell components.

subclassfeature3.description: I know the Minor Illusion cantrip and can cast certain spells by using FP (see page 3)

subclassfeature6.name: Shadow Step
subclassfeature6.description: I can use a Bonus Action to teleport up to 60 feet while in Dim Light or Darkness. I gain Advantage on my next melee attack before the turn ends.

subclassfeature11.name: Improved Shadow Step
subclassfeature11.description: 1 Focus Point, I can use Shadow Step to teleport without needing to start and end in Dim Light or Darkness. I can also make an Unarmed Strike immediately after teleporting.

subclassfeature17.name: Cloak of Shadows
subclassfeature17.description:
As a Magic action in Dim Light or Darkness, 3 FP to shroud myself in shadows for 1 min.
   I lose this if I end my turn in Bright Light or am Incapacitated. While shrouded, I gain:
   The Invisible Condition
   I can move through occupied spaces as Difficult Terrain
   and will be shunted to the last unoccupied space if I end my turn in an occupied space
   I can use Flurry of Blows without spending Focus Points.

subclassfeature3.name: Elemental Attunement
subclassfeature3.description:
At the start of my turn, 1 FP for 10 mins of elemental energy. While active:
   My Unarmed Strikes have 10ft extra reach, and deal my choice: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning,
   or Thunder damage, and on hit Str save or I can move the target up to 10ft

subclassfeature6.name: Elemental Burst
subclassfeature6.description:
As a Magic action, 2 FP for a 20ft radius burst of Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder damage within 120ft
   Affected Creatures make a Dex save, or 3x Martial dice roll damage, half on success.

subclassfeature11.name: Stride of the Elements
subclassfeature11.description: While my Elemental Attunement is active, I gain Fly and Swim Speed equal to my Speed.

subclassfeature17.name: Elemental Epitome
subclassfeature17.description:
When Elemental Attunement is active:
   I gain Resistance to Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder, and can change on my turn.
   Step of the Wind adds 20ft Speed, for the duration I can deal damage (Acid, Cold,
   Fire, Lightning or Thunder), to each creature within 5ft once per turn.
   Once per turn, extra damage with Unarmed Strikes of the same damage type.

subclassfeature3.name: Open Hand Technique
subclassfeature3.description:
When I hit a crea. with a Flurry of Blows attack, I can impose one of these effects:
   Crea. can't make Opportunity Attacks until its next turn.
   Crea. makes a Str save or is pushed 15ft
   Crea. makes a Dex save or is knocked Prone.

subclassfeature6.name: Wholeness of Body
subclassfeature6.description: As a Bonus Action, I can heal myself for 1 Martial die roll + my Wis mod.

subclassfeature11.name: Fleet Step
subclassfeature11.description: When I use a Bonus Action other than Step of the Wind, I can also use Step of the Wind immediately after.

quivering palm.name: Quivering Palm
quivering palm.description:
[4 focus points]When I hit a creature with an unarmed strike, I can start imperceptible vibrations
   Within my monk level in days, I can use an action to have the creature make a Con save
   If it fails, it takes 10d12 necrotic damage, half on success.

subclassfeature3.name: Channel Divinity: Sacred Weapon
subclassfeature3.description: As part of the attack action, I can imbue 1 held melee weapon for 10 minutes or until I use this feature again. While active, I add my Cha modifier to attacks and choose Radiant or normal damage on each hit. It also emits 20-ft radius bright light and 20-ft more dim light.

atkCalc: If I include the words 'Sacred Weapon' in the name of a weapon, it gets my Charisma modifier added to its To Hit.

subclassfeature7.name: Aura of Devotion
subclassfeature7.description: While I'm conscious, allies within range and I can't be charmed

subclassfeature15.name: Smite of Protection
subclassfeature15.description: When I cast Divine Smite my allies & I have Half Cover while in my aura of protection until the start of my next turn.

subclassfeature20.name: Holy Nimbus
subclassfeature20.description:
As a Bonus Action, I can give my Aura of Protection the benefits below for 10 minutes:
   Holy Ward: I have Advantage on saving throws I'm forced to make by a Fiend or Undead.
   Radiant Damage: An enemy that starts its turn in range takes my Cha mod + Prof Bonus Radiant damage.
   Sunlight: The aura is filled with Bright Light that is sunlight.
   I can end it for free; I can spend a level 5 spell slot or Long Rest to restore it.

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells
spellcastingExtra: protection from evil and good legacy

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

legacySpells: protection from evil and good legacy

subclassfeature3.name: Channel Divinity: Inspiring Smite
subclassfeature3.description:
Immediately after dealing damage with Divine Smite, I can grant temporary HP
   I distribute the temporary HP how I choose across creatures within 30 ft, including me

subclassfeature3.1.name: Channel Divinity: Peerless Athlete
subclassfeature3.1.description:
As a bonus action, I can get adv. on Str (Athletics) & Dex (Acrobatics) checks for 1 hour
   In that time, I also add +10 ft to long and high jumps

subclassfeature7.name: Aura of Alacrity
subclassfeature7.description: If I'm not incapacitated, allies starting their turn in range gain bonus speed for that turn

subclassfeature15.name: Glorious Defense
subclassfeature15.description:
As a reaction when I or another in 10 ft is hit with an attack roll, I can grant bonus AC
   I must be able to see the attacker; I add my Cha mod (min 1) to the AC for that attack
   If it misses, I can do a weapon attack vs. the attacker, if in reach, as part of this reaction

subclassfeature20.name: Living Legend
subclassfeature20.description:
As a bonus action, I can empower myself with legends, gaining the following for 10 mins:
    • My otherworldly presence grants me advantage on Charisma checks
    • Once on each of my turns when I miss with a weapon attack, I can have it hit instead
    • As a reaction when I fail a saving throw, I can reroll it, but must use the new roll
   I can do this once per long rest, or by expending a 5th-level or higher spell slot (SS 5+)

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature3.name: Channel Divinity: Nature's Wrath
subclassfeature3.description:
As a magic action, a creature I can see within 15 ft must make a Str save
   If it fails this save, it is restrained until it succeeds on a save at the end of its turn

subclassfeature7.name: Aura of Warding
subclassfeature7.description: My allies & I have Resistance to Necrotic, Psychic, & Radiant damage while in range.

subclassfeature15.name: Undying Sentinel
subclassfeature15.description:
If dropped to 0 hit points and not killed outright, I can choose to stay at 1 hit point
   Additionally, I suffer no drawbacks of old age and can't be aged magically

subclassfeature20.name: Elder Champion
subclassfeature20.description:
As a Bonus Action, I can give my Aura of Protection the benefits below for 10 minutes:
    • At the start of each of my turns, I regain 10 hit points
    • I can cast paladin spells with a casting time of 1 action as a bonus action instead
    • Enemies within range have disadv. on saves vs. my paladin spells and channel divinity

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature3.name: Channel Divinity: Vow of Enmity
subclassfeature3.description:
When I Attack I can make a Vow of Enmity against a creature I choose that I can see within 30 ft
   I have Adv on attack rolls against it for 1 min or until I use this feature again.
   If it drops to 0 HP before the Vow ends I can transfer the Vow to a different creature within 30 feet.

subclassfeature7.name: Relentless Avenger
subclassfeature7.description:
When I hit with an Opp Attack, I reduce the target's Speed to 0 until the end of the current turn.
   I can move up to half my Speed as part of the same Reaction without provoking Opp Attacks.

subclassfeature15.name: Soul of Vengeance
subclassfeature15.description:
When an enemy I have an active Vow of Enmity against makes an attack, I can react
   As a reaction, I can make a melee weapon attack against it if it is within range

subclassfeature20.name: Avenging Angel
subclassfeature20.description:
As a Bonus Action, I can gain the benefits below for 10 min or until I end them.
   Flight: I sprout spectral wings on my back, I have a Fly speed of 60 ft and can hover.
   Frightful Aura: When an enemy starts its turn in my Aura it must pass a Wis saving throw.
   On a failed save it is Frightened for 1 min or until it takes damage. Attacks against it have Adv.
   I can also restore this feature by spending a level 5 spell slot.

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature3.name: Primal Companion

subclassfeature7.name: Exceptional Training
subclassfeature7.description:
When I command my beast to take an action, I can also have it Dash/Disengage/Dodge/Help as a bonus action.
   My Primal Companion's attacks count can deal Force damage or its normal damage type.

subclassfeature11.name: Bestial Fury
subclassfeature11.description:
When I command my Primal Companion to use the Attack action, it can attack twice.
   My Primal Companion deals extra Force damage to my Hunter's Mark target.
   This occurs only the 1st time, each turn, the Primal Companion hits a creature.

subclassfeature15.name: Share Spells
subclassfeature15.description: When I cast a spell on myself, I can have it also affect my Primal Companion, if within 30 ft

subclassfeature3.name: Dreadful Strikes
subclassfeature3.description: My weapons deal extra psychic damage, but only once per turn per creature

atkAdd: When I hit a creature with a weapon, I can deal an extra 1d4 psychic damage to the target, which can take this extra damage only once per turn. From 11th-level, this damage increases to 1d6.

subclassfeature3.2.name: Otherworldly Glamour
subclassfeature3.2.description:
I can add my Wisdom modifier to any Charisma check I make (minimum of +1)
   I gain proficiency in Deception, Performance, or Persuasion; Use "Choose Feature" button

addMod.text: I can add my Wisdom modifier to any Charisma check I make (minimum of +1).
I can add my Wisdom modifier to any Charisma check I make (minimum of +1).
I can add my Wisdom modifier to any Charisma check I make (minimum of +1).
I can add my Wisdom modifier to any Charisma check I make (minimum of +1).

deception proficiency.name: Otherworldly Glamour
deception proficiency.description:
[Deception proficiency]
   I can add my Wisdom modifier to any Charisma check I make (minimum of +1)

performance proficiency.name: Otherworldly Glamour
performance proficiency.description:
[Performance proficiency]
   I can add my Wisdom modifier to any Charisma check I make (minimum of +1)

persuasion proficiency.name: Otherworldly Glamour
persuasion proficiency.description:
[Persuasion proficiency]
   I can add my Wisdom modifier to any Charisma check I make (minimum of +1)

subclassfeature7.name: Beguiling Twist
subclassfeature7.description:
I have advantage on saves against being charmed or frightened.
   As a reaction when a creature I see in 120 ft succeeds its save vs. charmed or frightened,
   I can have another I see in 120 ft make a Wis save or be charmed/frightened (my choice).
   This lasts for 1 minute and the target can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns

subclassfeature11.name: Fey Reinforcements
subclassfeature11.description:
I learn Summon Fey; It needs no material component, nor counts against spells known.
   Once per long rest, I can cast it without expending a spell slot.
   When cast, I can have it not require concentration, its duration becomes 1 minute

subclassfeature15.name: Misty Wanderer
subclassfeature15.description:
I can cast Misty Step without expending a spell slot and can bring a willing creature within 5 ft
   That creature teleports to an unoccupied space of my choice within 5 ft of my destination.

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature3.name: Dread Ambusher
subclassfeature3.description:
I can add my Wisdom modifier to my initiative rolls
   In the first turn of combat I get +10 ft speed and an extra attack with the Attack action
   If I take the Attack action and that extra attack hits, it does +1d8 damage

addMod.text: I can add my Wisdom modifier to my initiative rolls.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Gloom Stalker Magic
subclassfeature3.1.description:
I add a spell to my known spells at level 3, 5, 9, 13, and 17
   These count as ranger spells, but do not count against the number of spells I can know

subclassfeature3.2.name: Umbral Sight
subclassfeature3.2.description:
